comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The picture shows a Fokker Trimotor with an advertising text on the side of the fuselage for cigarettes. P. Lorillard introduces Old Gold cigarettes. The firm is well known for its Murad cigarettes and their slogan, "Be nonchalantight a Murad"; Old Golds will gain popularity with the slogan, "Not a cough in a carload"
